# isMonitoring

**Instance Property**

Yes when the receiver is actively monitoring.

## Declaration

```swift
var isMonitoring: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSmartFramingMonitor/startMonitoring()] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSmartFramingMonitor/stopMonitoring()].

## Managing the life cycle

- **startMonitoring()**: Begins monitoring the device’s active scene and making framing recommendations.
- **stopMonitoring()**: Stops monitoring the device’s active scene and making framing recommendations.
